locsearch.plot package¶

Submodules¶

locsearch.plot.plot module¶

locsearch.plot.plot.iterations_plot(data)¶

Plots the data in an iterations-value plot.

Parameters:data (collections.namedtuple) – The data tuple one gets by performing a localsearch algorithm.
locsearch.plot.plot.plot(data)¶

Plots the data in a time-value plot.

Parameters:data (collections.namedtuple) – The data tuple one gets by performing a localsearch algorithm.
